name: Hansel (zoped, blubberbaleen, hiijcat, turtletennis, tfx)
description:
After receiving an unexpected call from your son it turns out he needs you to look after your grandson, Hansel. Caring for him isn't too difficult. Just make sure Hansel is fed, comfortable, and entertained - much like caring for Snuffles.
